dpath_bids.description: This directory contains the imaging data converted to the BIDS standard.

dpath_derivatives.description: This directory contains the outputs of image processing and extraction pipelines. Outputs of different pipelines are stored in `<pipeline_name>/<pipeline_version>` subdirectories.

dpath_src_tabular.description: This directory is for the raw, unorganized or arbitrarily organized tabular data.

dpath_post_reorg.description: This directory is for the organized source data that is ready for BIDS conversion.

dpath_downloads.description: This directory is for downloaded data archives (e.g., tarballs or zipped files).

dpath_code.description: This directory is for custom code.

dpath_pipelines.description: This directory is for storing the Nipoppy configuration information and custom code.

dpath_containers.description: This directory is for storing the container image files for the BIDS conversion/processing pipelines.

dpath_pybids_db.description: This directory is for PyBIDS databases generated/used during processing.

dpath_scratch.description: This directory is for scratch data.

dpath_pre_reorg.description: This directory is for raw, unorganized imaging file dumps.

dpath_tabular.description: This directory is for tabular/phenotypic data.

dpath_assessments.description: This directory is for assessments data.

fpath_config.description: The configuration file for a dataset is where all data processing is configured.

fpath_doughnut.description: The doughnut file is generated/updated internally and is used to keep track of the raw data organization and BIDS conversion process.

fpath_manifest.description: The manifest file lists all expected study participants and visits.

fpath_imaging_bagel.description: The imaging bagel file lists availability of derived imaging data and pipeline processing statuses.

fpath_demographics.description: The demographics file contains demographic information for study participants.
